meta_description: Automated Dollar Cost Averaging for Bitcoin and crypto. Self-custody, open source, 7 exchanges supported.
hero_subtitle: Self-custody Bitcoin DCA that runs on your phone. No cloud, no tracking, no middlemen. Just you and your exchanges.
value_custody_desc: Your API keys never leave your device. Encrypted with AES-256-GCM via Android Keystore. No cloud, no tracking.
value_auto_desc: Configure once, accumulate forever. AccBot executes purchases on your schedule, even when your phone is in your pocket.
value_open_desc: Fully auditable code under MIT license. No hidden fees, no premium tiers, no data collection. Free forever.
features_strategies_desc: Choose from three strategies to optimize your accumulation. Classic DCA buys a fixed amount every time. ATH-based increases purchases when price drops below all-time high. Fear & Greed adjusts based on market sentiment.
features_strategies_ath_desc: 0.5x near ATH, up to 3x at 70%+ below
features_strategies_fg_desc: 0.25x at extreme greed, 2.5x at extreme fear
features_portfolio_desc: Track your holdings, ROI, and performance with interactive charts. See your cost basis, current value, and returns across all exchanges and trading pairs.
features_history_desc: Complete history of every DCA purchase with filtering by crypto, exchange, and status. Export to CSV for tax reporting or your own analysis.
features_sandbox_desc: Test your strategies risk-free with exchange testnet environments. Sandbox uses a separate database so your production data stays safe.
features_withdrawal_desc: Automatically send purchased crypto to your own wallet address after each purchase. True self-custody.
features_qr_desc: Scan your API keys and wallet addresses with your camera. No more error-prone manual entry of long alphanumeric strings.
exchanges_subtitle: Connect to any of 7 major exchanges. Create multiple DCA plans across different exchanges and trading pairs.
security_subtitle: AccBot is built on a decentralized, security-first architecture. Your data stays on your device.
security_aes_desc: API credentials encrypted with hardware-backed Android Keystore
security_local_desc: No data is ever uploaded to any server
security_direct_desc: Communication goes directly to exchanges via HTTPS
security_biometric_desc: Optional fingerprint or face recognition to open the app
security_opensource_desc: Fully auditable codebase under MIT license
security_nocloud_desc: No analytics, no tracking, no ads, no telemetry
howto_step1_desc: Add your exchange API keys with trading-only permissions. Scan QR codes or enter manually.
howto_step2_desc: Set your crypto, amount, frequency, and strategy. Choose from Classic, ATH-based, or Fear & Greed DCA.
howto_step3_desc: AccBot runs in the background and executes purchases on your schedule. Track performance in the portfolio view.
download_subtitle: Available for Android. Free and open source.
privacy_intro: AccBot ("the App") is a self-custody cryptocurrency DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging) tool developed by Crynners. This privacy policy explains how the App handles your data.
privacy_collection_text: AccBot does not collect, transmit, or store any personal data on external servers. All data remains exclusively on your device.
privacy_stored_text: The following data is stored locally on your device only:
privacy_stored_item1: Exchange API credentials (encrypted with AES-256-GCM via Android Keystore)
privacy_stored_item2: DCA plan configurations (crypto pair, amount, frequency, strategy)
privacy_stored_item3: Transaction history (purchase records from your DCA executions)
privacy_network_text: The App communicates directly with cryptocurrency exchanges via HTTPS to execute trades and retrieve market data. No data is sent to any other server. There are no analytics, tracking, or advertising services.
privacy_perm_internet: Internet: Required to communicate with exchange APIs for executing trades and fetching market data
privacy_perm_camera: Camera: Used exclusively for scanning QR codes containing API keys or wallet addresses. Camera data is not stored or transmitted.
privacy_perm_battery: Battery optimization exemption: Required for reliable background execution of scheduled DCA purchases
privacy_perm_alarm: Exact alarms: Required for precise scheduling of DCA purchase executions
privacy_perm_foreground: Foreground service: Required to monitor and execute DCA plans in the background
privacy_thirdparty_text: AccBot does not integrate any third-party analytics, advertising, or tracking services. The only external communication is with cryptocurrency exchanges that you explicitly connect.
privacy_deletion_text: All data can be deleted by using the "Delete All Data" option in Settings, or by uninstalling the App. Since no data is stored externally, uninstallation removes all traces of your data.
privacy_children_text: AccBot is not intended for use by children under 18. The App facilitates cryptocurrency trading which is subject to age restrictions in most jurisdictions.
privacy_changes_text: Any changes to this privacy policy will be published in the app's source code repository and reflected on this page.
privacy_contact_text: For questions about this privacy policy or the App, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.
